short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Request your favourite blogs, news,  stories and all kinds of articles to be converted as a podcast by EarLyApp.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VoiceUp by EarLyApp is a simple chrome extension that enable you to instantly share any blog, news, story or any other web page to be converted as a podcast by EarLyApp.
This extension automatically shares the page url and title to our server, where our team picks the articles from the queue and creates a podcast from it. You can also share an optional title to be used in the podcast.
To attribute the request to you, we also need basic details like name, phone number and email.
